normal.text: 接收查询AD用户信息请求

normal.scriptContent:
List < Map > data = dbop.select("select  replace(account,'trinasolar\\','') as samaccountname,hrid as employeenumber, userdspname name,userdspname as displayname,'1' as enabled,getdate() as updatetime,'' as deptgroup_ad,getdate() as deptgroup_update from AD_USERS where len(hrid)<=6", message);
return data;

normal.text: 插入用户数据至中间表

exception.text: 把异常对象转换为文本

exception.text: 把异常信息替换换行符
exception.description: 把异常信息替换换行符
exception.scriptContent:
String exceptionContent = message.getPayload();String exception = exceptionContent.replace("\n", "
");message.setPayload(exception);return message;
